Introduction
This topic contains information on handling claims from VSI/SI claimants, including
definition of a serious illness or injury
case management of claims from VSI/SI claimants
handling a claim from a VSI/SI service member who is not yet discharged
requesting a VSI/SI claimant's claims folder previously held at VA's Records Management Center (RMC)
, and
rating considerations when processing a claim from a VSI/SI claimant
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 1 - Priority Processing Programs and Special Requirements
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section None
